ClientConnectionThread
this class can be used both by clientCLI and clientGUI this class only purpose is to read updates messages and update the view if this class receives another type of message from the server then it forwards the message to clientCLI or ClientGUI

ClientModel
this is the main class of the view on the client both clientGUI and ClientCLI read the info saved in these classes to shoe to the user the state of the game these values get updated with update messages coming from the server some of these classes extend the MyObservable class because we use observer observable to repaint the Jpanels of the GUI
